item.description:
The Small Business Success Network™ is the leading Boston area community dedicated to helping small business owners and independent professionals grow their business, with a special emphasis on service-based small businesses.

The group features resources, networking and best practices that will help you with marketing, social media, small business management, and overall help you be more successful.

This group is for
* Small business owners
* Solopreneurs and entrepreneurs
* Self-employed professionals of all kinds
* Service-based small businesses
* Small business managers
* People just starting out in self-employment, and
* Those who have been in business a long time
* Anyone who wants to learn more about small business success
* Kindly note that this group is not for multilevel marketing (MLM) or any aggressive sales.

We invite you to join us today and to connect with and learn from other professionals, small business owners and solopreneurs.

Sponsor

The Boston Small Business Success Network™ is sponsored by Mark Reinert and Authentic Business Growth, LLC

www.AuthenticBusinessGrowth.com
item.name: Boston Small Business Success Network
